title: Pubic Symphysis-Fetal Head Segmentation Network Using BiFormer Attention Mechanism and Multipath Dilated Convolution
details: P Cai, L Jiang, Y Li, X Liu, L Lan - arXiv preprint arXiv:2410.10352, 2024
abstract: Pubic symphysis-fetal head segmentation in transperineal ultrasound images plays a critical role for the assessment of fetal head descent and progression. Existing transformer\iffalse-based\fi segmentation methods based on sparse attention …

title: Using a sum of the cross diameters of the appendix measured on ultrasonography as a criterion can more effectively predict acute appendicitis
details: S Wu, F Gu, M Yu, Z Zhu - European Radiology, 2024
abstract: Objective To investigate whether using a sum of the cross diameters on the transverse section of the appendix as a criterion can improve the diagnosis of acute appendicitis (AA). Methods In this retrospective study, 433 patients with AA and 207 …
